Insects are important in the pollination of plants. If they disappeared, plants would not be able to reproduce.
Insects are important in the decomposition of organic matter. If they disappeared, the world would be full of waste.
Insects are important in the control of pests. If they disappeared, there would be no control of pests.
Insects are important in the production of medicines. If they disappeared, there would be no medicines.
Insects are important in the production of food. If they disappeared, there would be no food.
